name: The Tricks of the Trading Game Trivia Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: First, we have to find the Cucco lady and she will give you a Pocket Egg.  What area can you find the Cucco lady in?
questions.explanation:
Kakariko Village.

	The Cucco lady will give you a Pocket Egg which will hatch into a Pocket Cucco after a day.  You get the Pocket Egg after gathering all of the Cuccos in town.

questions.text: After returning the happy Pocket Cucco, what is the name of the blue chicken she trades you?
questions.explanation:
Cojiro.

	Cojiro the blue chicken is given to you after you wake up Talon with the Pocket Cucco.

questions.text: Where do you take the blue chicken?
questions.explanation:
Lost Woods.

	You give Cojiro to the guy in the Skull Kid's clearing in the Lost Woods.  You will then receive the Odd Mushroom.

questions.text: What is made from the Odd Mushroom?
questions.explanation:
Odd Medicine.

	The Odd Medicine must be brought back to the guy in the Lost Woods from the Old Hag in the potion shop in Kakariko Village.  When you finally get back, the old man is already gone.

questions.text: Where do you take the Poacher's Saw?
questions.explanation:
Gerudo Valley.

	You get the Poacher's Saw from the little Kokiri girl who was in the Lost Woods, and you bring it to the carpenter in Gerudo Valley.  He'll then give you the broken Biggoron Sword.

Biggoron & Big Goron.

	Biggoron needs eyedrops to make you the new sword, so we need to go around Hyrule to get them back.

King Zora.

	King Zora will give you an Eyeball Frog, but we need to make sure he's unfrozen from the red ice.  So make sure you unfreeze him with blue fire before you head over to Zora's Domain.

questions.text: Where do you take the Eyeball Frog?
questions.explanation:
Lake Hylia.

	Now that we have the ingredient for the eyedrops, we need to bring it to the lab in three minutes. If we warp we automatically lose, so get onto Epona and ride!

questions.text: How long do you have to deliver the Eyedrops?
questions.explanation:
Four minutes.

	Now that we have the eyedrops, we need to head to the top of Death Mountain without using the warp all the way from Lake Hylia!  We need Epona again, so saddle up!

questions.text: What is the final item in the trading game?
questions.explanation:
Biggoron Sword.

	Now we've claimed the Claim Check, and we can use the Sun Song to go forward a few days to claim the Biggoron Sword!  The Biggoron Sword is like the Giant's Knife, but it won't break!
